How many people are affected by N-acetylglutamate synthase deficiency ?,"N-acetylglutamate synthase deficiency is a very rare disorder. Only a few cases have been reported worldwide, and the overall incidence is unknown.",GHR,N-acetylglutamate synthase deficiency
